member.name: T:System.Web.HttpUtility
member.summary: Provides methods for encoding and decoding URLs when processing Web requests. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlAttributeEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Minimally converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlAttributeEncode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Minimally converts a string into an HTML-encoded string and sends the encoded string to a output stream.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded for HTTP transmission into a decoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Converts a string that has been HTML-encoded into a decoded string, and sends the decoded string to a output stream.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.Object)
member.summary: Converts an object's string representation into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the encoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to an HTML-encoded string.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlEncode(System.String,System.IO.TextWriter)
member.summary: Converts a string into an HTML-encoded string, and returns the output as a stream of output.

member.name: M:System.Web.HttpUtility.UrlDecode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Converts a URL-encoded byte array into a decoded string using the specified encoding object, starting at the specified position in the array, and continuing for the specified number of bytes.
member.param: The array of bytes to decode.
The position in the byte to begin decoding.
The number of bytes to decode.
The object that specifies the decoding scheme.
member.exception: is less than or greater than the length of the array. -or- is less than , or + is greater than the length of the array.

The that specifies the decoding scheme.
